resources.string: Access to the location service is required for \'Covid-19 traces map`\ feature to work, which shows the count of Covid-19 traces at your current location on the map.

This app requires location permission to be enabled. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Covid-19 Map\'.
Location permission is required for this app to work.
